title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the latest between Kyler Murray and Cardinals ownership after Murray's agent releases a lengthy statement about Murray's contract status. He talks about the Lakers hitting rock bottom after back to back disappointing losses and how this could potentially get worse. He tells you why he was right about Sean McVay and wrong about Zion Williamson. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst TJ Houshmandzadeh joins the show to tell Colin if Aaron Rodgers is returning to the Packers next season. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
